duties_responsibilities.duty: Acquire understanding of project requirements and analyze architectural drawings.
Produce detailed bids and select advantageous deals for project submission.
Build relationships with key vendors and conduct day-to-day follow-up on proposed projects.
Estimate costs for discrete portions of work and research pricing on materials and labor.
Meet with salespersons, distributors, and clients, and establish effective working relationships with the team.
Ensure adherence to regulations and perform other duties as assigned or required.

education_certification.credential: 2 Years of experience as an Estimator (entry level)
